name: Froggies!
description:
A small project inspired by Moshi Monsters and other virtual pet MMOs, Froggies! is a game where you customize, feed, and play games with a frog.

Current Features

  • Choose your frog's color, eyes, and mouth
  • Add one of many silly hats to your frog
  • Feed your frog
  • Play a minigame that's a ripoff of a nick game that I'm shocked I got working

Planned Features:

  • More minigames
  • More frog customization options
  • Hat store, to make customization more rewarding
  • Accessories for your frog (this is working, I just haven't drawn any)
  • actual nice-looking graphics
  • Pond customization
  • More Nonsense
  • My sister asked me to add moshlings
  • Froggy game is 100% guaranteed to never make you cry
